meanings.definition: The study of the relationships between languages, especially in terms of their historical development.
meanings.sent1: Glottochronology helps linguists understand how languages change over time.
meanings.sent2: Researchers used glottochronology to trace the evolution of ancient languages.
meanings.sent3: The professor's passion for glottochronology made even the most boring lectures interesting.
meanings.sent4: In the world of glottochronology, languages are like branches on a vast family tree.
meanings.sent5: The book on glottochronology painted a vivid picture of linguistic evolution.

meanings.definition: A method of estimating the time since two languages diverged from a common ancestor.
meanings.sent1: Using glottochronology, experts can determine how long ago languages split apart.
meanings.sent2: The accuracy of glottochronology depends on various linguistic factors.
meanings.sent3: The glottochronology results were so surprising that they sparked a lively debate.
meanings.sent4: Glottochronology acts as a linguistic time machine, revealing hidden language connections.
meanings.sent5: The concept of glottochronology fascinated language enthusiasts worldwide.
